item.title: Defining a Security Champion
item.description: Security Champions are a key element of any AppSec team, since they create a cross-functional team focused on Application Security. What is a Security Champion? Security Champions are active members of a team that may help to make decisions about when to engage the Security Team Security Champions act as the “voice” of security for the given product or team Security Champions assist in the triage of security bugs for their team or area (see definition here)
